message: I propose a 60-40 split in my favor to account for the higher inflation rate I face. This is fair since my money loses value faster than yours.

Given the rejection of your previous offer and considering the inflation rates, I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This accounts for the fact that while your money loses value faster, I also face inflation, albeit at a lower rate. Let's find a balance that acknowledges both our situations.
